column4: When you wear a type of armor with which you are proficient the armor check penalty for that armor applies only to Balance Climb Escape Artist Hide Jump Move Silently Sleight of Hand and Tumble checks.
column5: A character who is wearing armor with which she is not proficient applies its armor check penalty to attack rolls and to all skill checks that involve moving including Ride.
column6: Figthers barbarians paladins clerics druids and bards automatically have Armor Proficiency (medium as a bonus feat). They need not select it
